title: Search Criteria
description:
All hex searches work with and without 0x prefix.
The following formats are supported:

  1. Blocks 64 Hex characters
  2. Block using Transaction Id 64 Hex characters
  3. Addresses Bech32 Format
  4. Nft Address 66 Hex characters or Bech32 Format
  5. Outputs 68 Hex characters
  6. SlotIndex a unique index number
  7. Slot Commitment ID the identifier of the _slot_ this block commits to.
  8. Epoch a unique index number
  9. Token Id 76 Hex characters
  10. NFT Id 64 Hex characters
